programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: Cherry rescues a nest of baby birds. Poly-GON seizes the opportunity to infiltrate the Ollie Squad's home with his state-of-the-art, artificially intelligent Birdbot.

programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Arty and his sidekick Epiphany, as they search the galaxy to solve creative problems with art!

programme.title: Little Tami's Book
programme.desc: Tami, Hebe and Elly enter the magical picture book Booky to learn about racing from Jasmine, a professional race car driver. Will Tami and friends qualify for the Race Car Driver badge?

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Detective Brewster works to help Wilson find Koko's award ribbon that Wilson secretly barrowed and then lost! Will they be able to find Koko's award before she finds out Wilson lost it?

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The children head over to Outer Space to experience Mr Space Robot's Art Show. However, they accidentally break his greatest art work. Will they be able to fix it before Mr Space Robot finds out? Paula and friends are playing pretend knights to the rescue! Knight Tim struggled to ride his horse and intensity rises when Paula and the rest gets in trouble. Can Knight Tim come to the rescue?

programme.title: Rev & Roll

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Dorothy Gale and her trusty dog Toto search for Glinda the Good, in the hope that she can give them the magic they need to send them home to Kansas.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Alvin thinks Theodore's teddy bear can tell the future, Alvin goes all out to make Talking Teddy his friend.

programme.title: 31st SEA Games: Today At The Games
programme.desc: Hosted by Edward Russell and Kelly Latimer, "Today at the Games" features a daily round-up of Team Singapore's performance at the Games.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore
programme.desc: Top brass from DBS bank visits the MasterChef Kitchen and highlights the environmental havoc caused by food waste. To encourage zero waste cooking, they offer a cash prize to the home cook who can create the most delicious dish with food scraps rescued from restaurant waste bins. The bottom six are then thrown a curve ball through a Hidden Pairs challenge. Guest Chef Nurul tests the contestants with ten of the strangest ingredient pairings you could ever imagine.

programme.title: Straight From The Heart
programme.desc: Straight From The Heart is a three-part anthology of quintessential slices of Singapore set in the heartland. A dark comedy about a serial pet killer on the loose, a poignant tale about two sisters and a story about neighbours who become friends - all the stories are based on written work by Singapore's well-known writers - all set and inspired by the HDB heartland.

programme.title: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: Dr. Shaun Murphy's unique ability to relate to a patient isolated by an immune deficiency yields an unexpected result. Meanwhile, Dr. Claire Browne, Dr. Morgan and Dr. Marcus treat a 12-year-old patient who is about to become blind, and tension builds between Dr. Neil and Dr. Audrey Lim.

programme.title: Beat Shazam
programme.desc: Beat Shazam is an interactive musical game show based on the Shazam app, in which teams compete against each other attempting to identify songs.

programme.title: The Wonderful World of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: The extraordinary wildlife, landscapes and people of the Amazon, the world's greatest river. From boiling streams and transparent lagoons, to pink river dolphins and riotous river carnivals, its great size hides spectacular secrets.

programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her, he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude. This demands practice, of course, but it especially demands lots of willpower and concentration to get rid of the rowdy Lemmings without losing one's temper.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Ranger's storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the ball's weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

He is in disbelief from the news!

programme.title: While You Were Away
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei is in a coma, and Zi Jun has to manage responsibilities from both work and family. programme.title: A League of Extraordinary Makers
programme.desc: Makers turn into superheroes when the pandemic brings supply chains to a grinding halt. Factories and production lines are replaced with 3D printers and laser cutters, driven by Makers the world over.
